GeneDef.label: hyper slow sleeper
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene take an unbelievably long time to completely fill their resting need.\n\nResting rate multipliers indirectly impact comfort because laying in beds tends to increase comfort. When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

GeneDef.label: super slow sleeper
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene take a super long time to completely fill their resting need.\n\nResting rate multipliers indirectly impact comfort because laying in beds tends to increase comfort. When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

GeneDef.label: fast sleeper

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

GeneDef.label: super fast sleeper
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene take substantially less time to completely fill their resting need.\n\nResting rate multipliers indirectly impact comfort because laying in beds tends to increase comfort. When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

GeneDef.label: hyper fast sleeper
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene take an unbelievably low amount of time to completely fill their resting need.\n\nResting rate multipliers indirectly impact comfort because laying in beds tends to increase comfort. When spending less time sleeping, it is less likely that the pawn will gain the full comfort that the bed provides.

GeneDef.label: diurnal
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are hard-wired to be awake during the day.

GeneDef.label: nocturnal
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are hard-wired to be awake during the night.
